org.apache.hadoop.hbase.quotas

Class QuotaObserverChore.TablesWithQuotas

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.quotas.QuotaObserverChore.TablesWithQuotas
  • Enclosing class:
    QuotaObserverChore

    static class QuotaObserverChore.TablesWithQuotas
extends Object
    A container which encapsulates the tables that have either a table quota or are contained in a namespace which have a namespace quota.
